title: The Effect of COVID-19 on Medical Supply Chains
itunes:title: The Effect of COVID-19 on Medical Supply Chains
description:
We set the Businessweek Agenda with Bloomberg Intelligence Chief Equity Strategist Gina Martin Adams and Bloomberg Stocks Editor Dave Wilson. Mike Alkire, President of Premier, talks about how COVID-19 is putting a strain on the medical supply chain and the distribution of a vaccine. Bloomberg Businessweek Editor Joel Weber and Bloomberg News Technology Reporter Olivia Carville discuss the story “No One Can Handle QAnon Like the Global Army of K-Pop Superfans.” Maelle Gavet, former COO at Compass, breaks down the Senate’s hearing with heads of big tech companies. And we Drive to the Close with Hilary Kramer, President and CIO at A&G Capital.

Hosts: Carol Massar and Kailey Leinz. Producer: Doni Holloway. 

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
